heroes.name: Healer 1
heroes.info: Heals a single unit for 1 health

heroes.name: Healer 2
heroes.info: Heals all team members in range for 1 health

heroes.name: Damage redirector
heroes.info: Attack is redirected from a single team member within range. Can not block assassins. Can only save on team member from area effect spells

heroes.name: Wall Builder 1
heroes.info: Build a wall. You can no longer attack someone in the same column through the wall. Walls remain on the board and are limited available

heroes.name: Wall Builder 2
heroes.info: Build a wall. You can no longer attack someone in the same column through the wall. Walls remain on the board and are limited available

heroes.name: Slow tank
heroes.info: One of the last units to move

heroes.name: Blocker
heroes.info: Can not be pushed or pulled

heroes.name: Area blocker
heroes.info: If hit, then it is the only hero who is receiving damage
